long_description: The boys' Sanuk Vagabond Madras Shoes feature easy rip-and-stick closures and casual style so your child can spend his days in comfort. Billed as a sandal-shoe hybrid from the Sanuk Sidewalk Surfer line, Vagabond slip-ons are canvas shoe uppers on sandal bottoms. Heavy-duty cotton canvas uppers have seams that are meant to fray, giving them a well-worn look. Rip-and-stick flap design makes getting these on and off an easy task. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption and stability. Footbeds feature AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment to deter odor development. EVA midsoles and outsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on; soles are rubberized EVA for durability. Sanuk Vagabond Madras Shoes are vegan-friendly.
short_description: The boys' Sanuk Vagabond Madras Shoes feature easy rip-and-stick closures and casual style so your child can spend his days in comfort.
